vecUnachieved.strDescription: Perform 3 takedowns within 12 seconds. (Ignored in introduction level.)
Climbing and going across the environment allows you to control the flow of the fight.
Reach your oldest appearance. Will you still have enough strength left to reach your goal?
Permanently unlock a skill for the first time.
Anything can be a weapon, so keep using your environment to your advantage. All is fair in such fights! (Ignored in training mode.)
Receive the highest age-based shrine reward for the first time.
In the Squats, clear the hangar in less than 1 minute 20 seconds after being detected by the main group.
Receive the highest score-based shrine reward for the first time.
Throwing enemies around makes handling big groups easier. (Ignored in training mode.)

data.strFullDescription:
[p]
[/p][p][imgvid poster.avif="https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/2138710/extras/3bfca271a5f5250b0fc9fc3885d755f0.poster.avif?t=1754156864" webm="https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/2138710/extras/3bfca271a5f5250b0fc9fc3885d755f0.webm?t=1754156864"][/imgvid]Itching for some more good ol' Kung Fu action? The free Arenas expansion adds multiple hours of gameplay that will put your Kung Fu to the test. With 5 new game modes, 15 dynamic locations and 120 challenges, gear up for spectacular combats, brutal opponents, and endless opportunities to refine your moves.
[/p][p]
[/p][p][imgvid poster.avif="https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/2138710/extras/d39bbc0951b756491cf3f3c43dc276b2.poster.avif?t=1754156864" webm="https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/2138710/extras/d39bbc0951b756491cf3f3c43dc276b2.webm?t=1754156864"][/imgvid]Whether you choose to play as a male or a female character, in Sifu, you will ponder that question on your path for revenge, hunting down your family’s assassins. One against all, you have no allies, countless enemies, and a mysterious amulet to bring you back to life every time you die. Yet, be warned! Your secret weapon comes with a hefty price to pay: aging and its consequences. 
[/p][p]
[/p][p][imgvid poster.avif="https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/2138710/extras/1eb5c0b2365c00eafcdfd357e6529b12.poster.avif?t=1754156864" webm="https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/2138710/extras/1eb5c0b2365c00eafcdfd357e6529b12.webm?t=1754156864"][/imgvid]Your enemies don’t wait their turn, and they don’t broadcast their intent. Dodge, parry, strike, use combos and be like water making its way through captivating environments. Learn how to master your art, whether by fighting through the underbelly of a nightclub, scrambling through a refined gallery to avoid getting surrounded, or vertically navigating a towering office building.
[/p][p]
[/p][p][imgvid poster.avif="https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/2138710/extras/32f327a2f94c552d6c6cb4ec63c60e17.poster.avif?t=1754156864" webm="https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/2138710/extras/32f327a2f94c552d6c6cb4ec63c60e17.webm?t=1754156864"][/imgvid]Careful positioning and clever use of the environment to your advantage are key to your survival. Use everything at your disposal: throwable objects, makeshift weapons, windows, and ledges... The odds are stacked against you, and you will be offered no mercy.
[/p][p]
[/p][p][imgvid poster.avif="https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/2138710/extras/c1e851f005bdc47e641edd76c5c26193.poster.avif?t=1754156864" webm="https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/2138710/extras/c1e851f005bdc47e641edd76c5c26193.webm?t=1754156864"][/imgvid]Kung Fu is mastery through practice, a path for both the body and the mind. Learn from your mistakes, unlock unique skills, and find the strength to master the devastating techniques of Pak Mei Kung Fu.[/p]
data.strSnippet: Sifu is a realistic third-person brawler with tight Kung Fu combat mechanics and cinematic martial arts action embarking you on a path for revenge.
